post.body: LOL, I will let you know when I get them in the mail so you can be on the lookout!! OK, going to sew now talk to you later!
I have your bag all done trying to get the others finished today so I can ship them tomorrow, gotta get them to you b4 Christmas
I could hear the rain before I even got out of bed I just wanted to stay all snuggled under the covers but can't too much to do
I love it, I actually had it in my treasury but had to add a couple folks so I decided to keep your painting in it instead
I am telling you what, it was very cool! It will drive you crazy for hours LOL! Their other brain teasers are cool too!
That is an AWESOME resolution, I have started craft shows for that very reason, with my bags though and not jewelry LOL!
alrighty ajo I am now following you! I hope you love twitter as much as I do!!
Thanks, it is great isn't it!! I just LOVE fabric!!
LOL, thanks! I think this is one gift I want to return!!
This is one of my top sellers, check it out and get your today http://tinyurl.com/3k8bd8

Relisted this morning http://tinyurl.com/4tt98g after selling yesterday! Great stocking stuffers for the kids
Check out this super cute bag that is still in my shop ( I know surprising HUH!) http://tinyurl.com/6ht4f4
Good morning! I so wanted to stay in bed this morning! Dense fog here in my part of NC!
Just listed this, they make great stocking stuffers, can still get it by Christmas http://tinyurl.com/4dkrp6
listed this cutie yesterday, http://tinyurl.com/4lvqpk got more to list but too cold/wet to go out for pics
Check out the post on this awesome blog http://tinyurl.com/5pcxur for some really great blog posts!

my treasury filled with cool ACE Team items that will be on sale 12/26-12/31 http://tinyurl.com/3wowbp
FREE SHIPPING to US on everything in my shop today http://tinyurl.com/2eyb2y get your last minute gifts today!
Alright my twitter friends, not much time today but just wanted to pass some info!
I have the usual "loose weight" "make more money" ones! Anyone have an unusual one?
I have big hopes for 2009, any resolutions out there that people want to make 'vocal'
I hope everyone has super New Years plans, we are staying home doing the family thing!!

Just listed a couple more things on artfire, check them out: http://tinyurl.com/9vfq2d
We are staying in and bringing in the new year, taking down the Christmas tree and family time~PERFECT!!
Has everyone got big plans for tonight?
Feeling much better today, head still stopped up some but WHEW much better than yesterday!!
After Christmas sale ends tonight at 11:59PM, just about everything in my shop is discounted http://tinyurl.com/2eyb2y
Oh yeah, BTW the 'Crud' is what the Dr called it! I laughed and asked him if that was the technical term!!
